targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "filesystem/usage" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "resource_id" =~ /^\/dev.*$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "cpu/usage_rate" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "nodename" fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "cpu/node_utilization" WHERE "type" = 'node' AND "nodename" =~ /^$node$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
